thread.title: Petrobras to Sell Natural-Gas Distribution Assets to Mitsui Unit
thread.title_full: Petrobras to Sell Natural-Gas Distribution Assets to Mitsui Unit - WSJ

author: Paul Kiernan
title: Petrobras to Sell Natural-Gas Distribution Assets to Mitsui Unit
text:
RIO DE JANEIRO—Brazilian state-run oil company Petróleo Brasileiro SA said Tuesday it is closing a deal to sell natural-gas distribution assets to a local subsidiary of Japan’s Mitsui & Co.
Petrobras didn’t attach a value to the transaction, which is subject to approval by its board and regulatory agencies, the company said in a securities filing. The assets for sale are Petrobras’ shares of natural-gas distribution firms in...
